pages.text: mattu navu mundinavaralli avara nenapannu sanraksisidevu
nuharige santi, sarvalokagalalli
khanditavagiyu navu ide riti satkarmigalannu puraskarisutteve
avaru khandita nam'ma visvasi dasaragiddaru
taruvaya navu itararannu mulugisi bittevu
innu, ibrahimarantu avara (nuhara) hadiyalle nadeyuvavaragiddaru
avaru nirmala manas'sinondige tam'ma odeyana sannidhige bandaru
Mattu avaru tam'ma tande hagu tam'ma janangadavarodane kelidaru; ‘‘nivu adenannu pujisuttiruviri?’’
‘‘Nivenu, allahana jote mithya saktigalannu devaragisalu bayasuvira?’’
‘‘Ella lokagala odeyana kuritu nim'ma abhiprayavenu?’’
A balika avaru naksatragaledege drsti biridaru
mattu nanu asvasthanagi bittiddene endaru
avarella (janangadavarella) avarannu (ibrahimarannu) bittu horatu hodaru
avaru (ibrahimaru) avara (tam'ma janangadavara) devarugaledege (vigrahagaledege) gamana harisidaru mattu kelidaru; ‘‘nivu enannu tinnuvudillave?’’
‘‘Nimagenagide? Niveke matanaduttilla?’’
Konege avaru avugala mele mugibiddu balavagi hodedaru
avarella (janangadavarella) avaredege dhavisi bandaru
avaru (ibrahimaru helidaru;) ‘‘nivenu, svatah nive ketti nirmisidavugalannu pujisuttira?’’
‘‘Nim'mannu mattu nivu racisuvavugalannella allahane srstisiruvanu’’
avaru (janangadavaru, paraspararodane) ‘‘avanigagi ondu agni kundavannu racisiri mattu avanannu benkigesedu bidiri’’ endaru
avaru (janangadavaru), avarige hani mada bayasiddaru. Adare navu avarannu kilagisibittevu
avaru (ibrahim) helidaru; nanu nanna odeyanedege teraluttene. Avanu nanage saridariyannu torabahudu
‘‘nannodeya, nanage srestha santatigalannu daya palisu’’ (endu avaru prarthisidaru)
konege navu avarige obba vivekavanta putrana (isma'ilara) subhavarte nididevu

Avaru (isma'ilaru) avara jote odadaballavaradaga avaru helidaru; ‘‘nanu ninna koralu koyyuttiruvudagi svapnadalli kandiddene. I kuritu ninna anisike enu?’’ Avaru (isma'il) helidaru; ‘‘appa, nimage adesisalagiruvudannu nivu madibidi. Allahanicchisidare, nivu nannannu sahanasilanagi kanuviri’’
hige avaribbaru vidheyate toridaru mattu avaru (ibrahimaru) avarannu (putranannu), mukha kelagagisi malagisidaru
